descriptionlist.description: Automatically imports ringtones from popular ringtone apps like Audiko and Zedge Ringtones.

Supports both runtime injection of ringtones (which does not modify any .plist file in the system)
and writing of metadata to Ringtones.plist in /var/mobile/Media/Itunes_Control/Itunes.
The benefit of modifying the ringtones plist is that the ringtones
behaves as if they were imported through iTunes
(works when not jailbroken, however iTunes itself wont show them)
Imported ringtones can be deleted within the Tonehelper preferences pane.
